chapters.title: Chapter 4:  The Gleeman
chapters.info: Artur Paendrag Tanreall, p. 43—Hero of Legend who ruled all the lands from the Aiel Waste to the Aryth Ocean and beyond. He even sent troops across the Aryth Ocean, as well as to the lands beyond the Aiel Waste. His death set off the War of the Hundred Years. His sign was a golden hawk in flight; he was also known as Artur Hawkwing.
